content.about: I’m a Computer Science major at Harvey Mudd College interested in software engineering. I'm currently a software engineer intern at [Dotdash](https://www.dotdash.com). I also enjoy baking, biking, and photography.

projects.title: Glaze Gallery
projects.description: Gallery to allow potters to view different glaze combinations, built using PHP and jQuery. View at the link below (the password is “Sassy”).

projects.title: Humans vs. Zombies App
projects.description: An application to faciliate a tag game at my college, made using [Flutter](https://flutter.dev) and [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com). A work in progress.

projects.title: Line App
projects.description: App to create and join virtual lines, built using [Flutter](https://flutter.dev) and [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com). A work in progress.

projects.title: Photo Portfolio
projects.description: A website showcasing some of my photography, built using [Vue.js](https://vuejs.org) and [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com). A work in progress.

projects.title: Galaxy Simulator
projects.description: A package for [Julia](https://julialang.org) implementing the parallelized [Barnes Hut](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barnes–Hut_simulation) approximation algorithm for an *n*-body simulation.
